--- In rest-discuss@yahoogroups.com, Ant=F3nio Mota <amsmota@...> wrote:
> =
What you saying is something like this?
> - A client and a server are coded=
 for a workflow Search - Choose - Buy.
> - The server choose to change that=
 to Search - Choose - Confirm - Buy.
> So, for this to work on the client, =
the agreed media-type has to define a
> priori those 4 relations, so the cl=
ient can discover it?

Yes.

> But if that's the case, what's the use of ge=
neric media-types like
> application/xml?

I don't know. I am not the one a=
rguing for using a generic format :-)

/J=F8rn
